name: Baboon Financial
description: BOON is an open source, peer-to-peer digital currency on the Binance Smart Chain. The network is built to bring together like minded apes to fund wildlife philanthropy. Utility for BOON includes: * Crowdfunding resources for projects (Operations Diddy and Donkey Kong). * Minting NFTs of community produced memes to fund operations. * A DAO for the community to vote on future charitable and memeable projects.
